newsitem.title: USA: Westmin Resources sells $120 mln in junk bonds. [corrected 22:58 gmt]
newsitem.headline: Westmin Resources sells $120 mln in junk bonds. [corrected 22:58 gmt]

text.p: The following public offering of high-yield bonds from Westmin Resources Ltd was priced on Thursday in the U.S. via lead manager Goldman Sachs & Co, market sources said. (Corrects type of offering from "144a private placement offering" to "public offering".)
Westmin, based in Vancouver, B.C., Canada, is a mining company whose primary output is zinc, copper and gold.
TYPE SNR SEC NOTES ISS PRICE 100 FIRST PAY DATE 9/15/07
LAST MOODY'S B3 YIELD 11 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P SINGLE-B SPREAD 443 BPS CALLABLE NON-CALLABLE FOR

NOTE: Forty percent of the issue is callable at 111 if the company conducts an equity offering within three years, market sources said. The issuer has the option of making payments in additional securities, payment-in-kind (PIK), rather than cash, from 1998 through 2000 at a 12.5 percent coupon, they added.
